Sentencas: Nanocrystalline 8 mol% yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ) powder has been synthesized by the oleate complex route.
Titulo: Synthesis of nanocrystalline 8 mol% yttria stabilized zirconia by the oleate complex route

Sentencas: Oleate complexes of zirconium and yttrium. were formed in the hexane rich layer by the reaction of sodium oleate with zirconyl chloride and yttrium chloride at the interface of the two ternary solutions in water-ethanol-hexane system.
Titulo: Synthesis of nanocrystalline 8 mol% yttria stabilized zirconia by the oleate complex route

Sentencas: The zirconyl oletae and yttrium oleate complexes on heating decomposed to oxide through the formation of carbonate intermediates.
Titulo: Synthesis of nanocrystalline 8 mol% yttria stabilized zirconia by the oleate complex route

Sentencas: The powder obtained by calcination at 600 degrees C for 2 It was cubic YSZ with surface area of 42 m(2)/g.
Titulo: Synthesis of nanocrystalline 8 mol% yttria stabilized zirconia by the oleate complex route

Sentencas: The YSZ powder contained primary particles of similar to 300 nm size and the primary particles were aggregate of crystallites of 5-10 nm.
Titulo: Synthesis of nanocrystalline 8 mol% yttria stabilized zirconia by the oleate complex route

Sentencas: The compacts prepared from the YSZ powder were sintered to similar to 99% TD (theoretical density) at 1400 degrees C.
Titulo: Synthesis of nanocrystalline 8 mol% yttria stabilized zirconia by the oleate complex route

Sentencas: The sintered YSZ had a low average grain size of 0.73 mu m. (C) 2008 Elsevier Ltd and Techna Group S.r.l.
Titulo: Synthesis of nanocrystalline 8 mol% yttria stabilized zirconia by the oleate complex route
